attributes.action: put more money into staffing and resources for hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to lack of funding and staff, my mother recieved poor care after a minor operation and ended up in hospital for 4 months.She passed away in January 2007 but with the appropriate care she may have had a better chance of survival.She wrote a letter describing her stay in the hospital and this will be sent to the appropriate professionals.
